en.A young man was standing by the bed hold: A young man was standing by the bed holding a cup of water.

pl.A young man was standing by the bed hold: Na łóżku trzymał kubek wody młody mężczyzna.

ru.A young man was standing by the bed hold: Молодой человек стоял у кровати, держа кружку воды.

zh-cn.A young man was standing by the bed hold: 一個年輕人站在床上，拿著一杯水。
